message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I think 60-40 is not fair, how about we meet in the middle at 55-45?
I see you're willing to negotiate, let's try 57-43, it's closer to the middle ground
I'm willing to meet closer to your offer, 52-48 is my new proposal, considering the money is losing value let's settle soon
